getIdleReason().Description: Gets the player state idle reason. This value is only meaningful if the player state is in fact @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#MediaStatus#PLAYER_STATE_IDLE_E@.

getPlayerState().Description: Gets the current media player state.

getPlaybackRate().Description: Gets the current stream playback rate. This will be negative if the stream is seeking backwards, 0 if the stream is paused, 1 if the stream is playing normally, and some other postive value if the stream is seeking forwards.

Returns: true if the command is supported, false otherwise.
isMediaCommandSupported(long).Description: Tests if the stream supports a given control command.

getStreamPosition().Description: Returns the current stream position, in milliseconds.

getCustomData().Description: Returns any custom data that is associated with the media item.

getActiveTrackIds().Description: Returns the list of active track IDs set by the cast receiver, if any, otherwise null.

ClassDesc: A class that holds status information about some media. The current @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#MediaStatus_E@ can be obtained from the @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#RemoteMediaPlayer_E@.
